arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta adamant that he 'fully trusts' new additions to step up despite key absences against Liverpool
arts.sum: Arsenal will definitely be without Bukayo Saka, Gabriel Jesus and Kai Havertz, while Leandro Trossard remains a doubt. Mikel Arteta insists that he has “full trust” in his new signings to step up despite key absences ahead of Sunday’s meeting with Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Journalist reveals where Arsenal can really hurt Liverpool
arts.sum: Arsenal are set to face Liverpool tomorrow in a fixture that promises intensity, quality, and potentially significant implications for the Premier League title race. arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta makes Arsenal vs Liverpool lineup declaration as SEVEN stars could miss match
arts.sum: Arsenal could potentially be without up to seven senior first-team players for their crunch early-season Premier League title clash against Liverpool
